https://tmrev.io/movie/435139-Earth Defense Widow 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gcFgtCALfIuLA7V864qfivqFZhw.jpg Dan (Mitsu Dan) is a former geisha, now working as an ace pilot for the Earth Defense Troops. Her fiance was killed by the space monster Bemurasu which consumes nuclear waste. To save Planet Earth, Dan attacks Bemurasu, but whenever she does, she feels ecstasy. Can she save Planet Earth? Earth Defense Widow
